categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Stephen Calcutt auditioned for Tzizvvt in A New Hope, though the final role was done by an animatronic.
He is credited by John Mollo as portraying a 'fly' in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars, although his name has an 'x' through it.
